name: $gpvisit
desc: An office visit for a specialist practitioner of a discipline

name: $spvisit
desc: An episode in an emergency department.

name: $emergency
desc: An episode of an Inpatient hospital stay.

name: $inpthosp
desc: A visit held where the patient is remote relative to the practitioner, e.g. by phone, computer or video conference.

name: $televisit
desc: A visit to an urgent care facility - typically a community care clinic.

name: $urgentcare
desc: A standard percentage applied to all classes or service or product not otherwise specified.

name: $copaypct
desc: A standard fixed currency amount applied to all classes or service or product not otherwise specified.

name: $copay
desc: The accumulated amount of patient payment before the coverage begins to pay for services.

name: $deductible
desc: The maximum amout of payment for services which a patient, or family, is expected to incur - typically annually.
